venue.name: The Madison Beach Hotel and Wharf Restaurant

item.description:
It's here...it's historic....be there or be square....

Saturday, August 29 9:30 pm THE WHARF/ MADISON, CT 94 West Wharf Road 203.245.0005

Join The Queen & The Montez Boys for what will likely be their final historic show at this great mid-Shoreline hang, and bid goodbye to the Hip-Shakinâ€™ Summer of 2009 in grand style. The Wharf will close in the Fall for complete renovation and will not likely reopen until after the 2010 season. THIS IS A NIGHT TO CELEBRATE SUMMERS PAST AND FUTURE....YOU MUST BE THERE!!! Show will take place on the first floor and reservations are recommended!

TABLES ARE BEING MOVED BACK TO ALLOW MORE ROOM FOR DANCING...
We urge you to call 203.245.0005 for a reservation well in advance. The place will be jam-packed.....Dinner reservations for parties of 6 or more being accepted for upstairs seating, too...

**Two Party Express downstairs tables for 6 each are reserved for 8:00 pm. First responders will get the table. Overflow "yes" responses will be put on a waiting list.


Concert begins around 9:30. Concert tickets are $8.00.


www.christineohlman.net
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Party Express table.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Christine Ohlman @ The Wharf - Madison
